sourcesContent:
const gridContainerStyle = {
  display: 'grid',
  gridTemplateColumns: `auto auto repeat(${4 + (customOptions.includes('Year 5') ? 1 : 0)}, 1fr)`,
  gridTemplateRows: `auto repeat(${3 + (customOptions.some(option => option.includes('Summer')) ? 1 : 0)}, 1fr)`,
  rowGap: customOptions.some(option => option.includes('Summer')) ? '0px' : '10px', // Vertical spacing between rows
  columnGap: '10px', // Horizontal spacing between columns
  width: 'calc(100vw - 280px)', // Adjust this value to leave some margin on the right
  height: 'calc(100vh - 80px)',
  marginTop: '40px',
  padding: '0', // Ensure no padding
  boxSizing: 'border-box',
};
